骪字的基本解释

骪
wěi
古同“??”。

骪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》於詭切，上紙，影。］
亦作“骩1”。亦作“骪1”。
(1)骨弯曲。
(2)后多作“委”。屈曲貌。
(3)后多作“委”。枉曲。
(4)后多作“委”。积聚。
(5)后多作“委”。委派。参见“骫任”。
(6)“萎”的古字。萎死。
[②]［wán］
见“骫2骳”。

骪字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【骨字部】　骪； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1448第02
【唐韻】於詭切【集韻】【韻會】鄔毀切，?音委。【說文】骨耑骪奊也。【玉篇】骨曲也。　又【前漢·淮南厲王傳】骪天下正法。【註】師古曰：骪，古委字，謂曲也。【枚臯傳】其文骪骳。【註】骪骳，猶言屈曲也。　又【楚辭·招隱士】林木茷骪。【王逸註】枝條盤紆。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】崔錯癹骪。【註】郭璞曰：癹骪，蟠戾也。　又【司馬相如·大人賦】容以骪麗兮。【註】張楫曰：骪麗，左右相隨也。　又【揚子·太?經】禍所骪也。【註】禍所鍾也。　又姓。【廣韻】出纂文。

考證：〔【枚乗傳】其文骪骳。〕　謹照原文枚乗改枚臯。

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
骪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
骪
wěi
Gu Tong "??".
骪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" in a sly cut, on paper, shadow. ]
Also known as "Pin 1". Also known as "骪1".
(1) Bone bending.
(2) Later it is often referred to as "committee". Buckling appearance.
(3) Later it is often referred to as "committee". In vain.
(4) Later it is often referred to as "committee". build up.
(5) Later it is often referred to as "committee". Delegate. See "Lian Ren".
(6) The ancient word for "withering". Withered.
[②]［wán］
See "骫2骳".
骪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Bone Character Department】　骪; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1448 No. 02
[Tang Yun] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Wu Ruiqie, the sound committee. [Said the text] The bones are also dying. [Jade articles] Bone song also.　[Previous Han · Huainan Li Wang Chuan] Fa-rectification in the world. [Note] Shi Gu said: Qi, Gu Wei word, said Qu also. [Mei Gao Biography] Its text is 骳骳. [Note] 骳骳, still saying buckling.　[The Songs of the Chu · Recruiting Hermits] Lin Mufuyu. [Wang Yi's Note] The branches are entwined.　[Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] Cui Cuoyu. [Note] Guo Pu said: Huang Yu, Pan Xie.　[Sima Xiangru·Adults' Fu] Rong Yilixi. [Note] Zhang Ji said: Li Li, right and left follow.　[Yangtze·Tai? Jing] Misfortunes are also happening. [Note] The calamity bell is also.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Compiled articles. Textual research: [[Mei Cheng Biography] The text of this story is 骳骳. 〕 　 I would like to change the Mei Cheng to Mei Gao according to the original text.
